Title: As Nitish Kumar takes charge of Bihar, Congress says Sonia Gandhi played key role to form Mahagathbandhan
Description: As Nitish Kumar took oath as Bihar CM for the eighth time, Congress MLA Pratima Das said Sonia Gandhi played a key role in the formation of Mahagathbandhan in the state.
Hindi: नीतीश कुमार ने बिहार की कमान संभाली, कांग्रेस का कहना है कि सोनिया गांधी ने महागठबंधन बनाने में अहम भूमिका निभाई

Title: Over 2,000 Cartridges Found In Delhi, Cops Say Terror Angle Not Ruled Out
Description: Delhi police have arrested six peoplefor their alleged involvement in the smuggling of ammunition ahead of Independence Day, officials said today.
Hindi: दिल्ली में मिले 2,000 से ज्यादा कारतूस, पुलिस का कहना है कि आतंकी एंगल से इंकार नहीं

Title: 250 Tax Officials Dressed As "Baaraati", 120 Cars - Maharashtra Raid Plan
Description: The raid during which Rs 390 crore-worth unaccounted assets were seized yesterday by the Income Tax department in Maharashtra's Jalna was nothing short of a movie scene, complete with officials disguised as that of a wedding party.
Hindi: 250 कर अधिकारियों ने "बाराती" के रूप में कपड़े पहने, 120 कारें - महाराष्ट्र छापे की योजना

Title: Migrant labourer from Bihar shot dead in Jammu and Kashmir
Description: This comes a day after four soldiers were killed in action and one was injured in an attack on an army camp in Jammu and Kashmir's Rajouri.
Hindi: जम्मू-कश्मीर में बिहार के प्रवासी मजदूर की गोली मारकर हत्या

Title: Do you need to pay GST on rented house? Check new rules applicable from July 18
Description: Earlier, rent of residential properties till July 17, 2022 was exempted from GST irrespective of whether the tenant or landlord is registered or not. But from July 18, a tenant who is registered will be liable to pay GST on renting a property for residential …
Hindi: क्या आपको किराए के घर पर जीएसटी देना होगा? 18 जुलाई से लागू नए नियम देखें

Title: 'Seek votes for BJP, but notes from Kejriwal': AAP leaders on Divya Kakran
Description: AAP on Friday dug out an old video of wrestler Divya Kakran where the athlete could be heard seeking votes for the BJP in Uttar Pradesh. The video is from February this year, before the election in the state.  | Latest News India
Hindi: 'बीजेपी के लिए वोट मांगें, लेकिन केजरीवाल से नोट': दिव्या काकरान पर आप नेता
